attributes.action: sack all immoral MP'S who still do not understand that the system that they created and milked is unacceotable to the Public and they now want more money to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's do not appear to understand that the expenses system they created and abused is total unacceptable to the Public who pay their wages and expenses, they hide behind the Rules and then try to prevent the release of the details by use of security legislation, Now that they have been exposed they want even more money to Resign its about time they got real, got sacked and prosecuted as normal members of the Public would have been

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
